meanings.definition: A device used to measure the intensity of light transmitted through a small area.
meanings.sent1: Scientists used microphotometers to study how light passes through tiny spaces.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician calibrated the microphotometers before conducting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The microphotometers at the research facility had a light-hearted competition to see which one could measure the smallest amount of light.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like microphotometers, capturing every detail of the scene before her.
meanings.sent5: The tiny microphotometers hummed softly as they diligently recorded the light readings.
